title: House Candidate Drops Ad in North Carolina After Report of Bullet Hole
description: After news belatedly broke that a Republican congressional candidate’s parents had found a bullet hole at their home, the Democrat in the race pulled an ad showing a different residence belonging to his opponent.
dc:creator: Christine Hauser
media:description: A photo provided by the campaign of Pat Harrigan, a Republican running for an open House seat in North Carolina, shows a bullet hole in a window in the laundry room of his parents’ home.
